02dcdcdb50d29258cd02631811f4f0982c590f70.query:
INSERT INTO records (id, user_id, character, figure, created_at)
                VALUES ($1, $2, $3, $4, $5)

a2278e33f60537f6315062ca0d5d4b9394122982.query:
SELECT
                    id,
                    user_id,
                    character,
                    figure,
                    created_at
                FROM
                    records
                WHERE
                    user_id = $1
                    AND
                    ($2::VARCHAR(8) IS NULL OR character = $2)
                    AND
                    ($3::VARCHAR(64) IS NULL OR id < $3)
                    AND
                    ($4::VARCHAR(64) IS NULL OR id > $4)
                ORDER BY
                    CASE WHEN $5 = 0 THEN id END DESC,
                    CASE WHEN $5 = 1 THEN id END ASC
                LIMIT $6

b361ad09ec116a159b5402dd372e9066e4715e2b.query:
SELECT
                            id,
                            user_id,
                            character,
                            figure,
                            created_at
                        FROM
                            records
                        WHERE
                            id = $1
                            AND user_id = $2
